name: Bad Cubes
description:
You are a blue cube trying not to get your hat shot off by other enemies. If you jump time goes slower. There is an important connection between you and your hat and you don't want to lose the connection or you will die.

shoot enemies  on the rooftops, and even in space! 

This is a very serious stress-inducing 2D shooter game where you shoot enemies and control time. Made for the Diving_Squid Community Jam!

Software used:

jsfxr for sounds

Unity game engine

Trello for planning
